title: The Firm (1993) Tom Cruise + Gene Hackman (Optional MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106918/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106918/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files: (Work in Windows Media Player etc.)
Arabic, Danish, Dutch, English, English for the hearing impaired, Finnish, German, Hungarian, Icelandic, Norwegian, Polish, Swedish, Turkish.

I think Tom Cruise made one of his best films in this John Grisham thriller: 
A young lawyer joins a prestigous law firm only to discover that it has its sinister dark sides.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x368, great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
